channel.title: Mobile-apps on InterMine - data integration, analysis, and warehousing
channel.description: Recent content in Mobile-apps on InterMine - data integration, analysis, and warehousing

item.title: InterMine Android and iOS Apps
item.description: InterMine's mobile apps allow you to carry the power of multiple InterMines in your pocket. They include a cross-InterMine search tool, as well as alowing you to browse lists, templates, and to create a selection of "favourites" - perhaps a set of publications to review or a collection of interesting genes. Android Search genes across multiple InterMines, as well as viewing lists, templates, and creating favourites. Developed by Daria Komkova.
